level.text: If requested by a Board member or required by ยง 1535.3, a motion shall be reduced to writing, delivered to the Executive Director or Chairman, and read.
Any motion may be withdrawn or modified by the maker at any time before the Board votes on the motion or an amendment to the motion.
When a question is under debate, the Chairman shall entertain no motions except the following:
To postpone to a day certain;
Motions cognizable during debates shall take precedence in the order set forth in Robert’s Rules of Order.
